sources.title: Breed of the Border (1933) BOB STEELE
sources.description:
Stars: Bob Steele, George "Gabby" Hayes, Marion Byron
Director: Robert N. Bradbury

Famous race car driver Speed Brent gets mixed up with an escaped murderer across the Mexican border. Luckily there's George "Gabby" Hayes and a beautiful government agent to rescue the day.

metadata.Plot: Joe has Cowboy-Race Driver Brent drive him to the border where his men slug Brent, and he shoots Stafford and takes his bonds. Brent's old friend Chuck arrives and the two head out to find the gang and recover the bonds.
metadata.Actors: Bob Steele, Marion Byron, Ernie Adams
